biotools.summary: MSRdb (Mycobacterial Systems Resource) is a mycobacterial systems resource for the research community. The Mycobacterial Systems Resource (MSR) is a comprehensive, integrated biological and bioinformatic resource for the research community. The MSR uses M. smegmatis as its model organism, while focusing exclusively on genes that are highly conserved across the mycobacterial genus. Thus, functional insights from the MSR will apply to all mycobacterial species.
